name: Flutterwave Easy Digital Downloads Payment Gateway
author: Tunbosun Ayinla

sections.description:
This is a Flutterwave payment gateway for Easy Digital Downloads.

You can sign up for a Flutterwave merchant account here

Flutterwave Easy Digital Downloads payment gateway plugin allows you to accept payment through multiple payment channels via Flutterwave

With this Flutterwave Easy Digital Downloads payment gateway plugin, you will be able to accept the following payment methods in your shop:

  • Card Payment
  • Bank Account Payment
  • Mobile Wallet Payment

Note

  • You will need to set your Base Country to either Nigeria, Kenya, Ghana or South Africa in the General tab on the Easy Digital Downloads settings page
  • Currencies supported by Flutterwave: NGN, USD, EUR, GBP, KES, GHS, ZAR

Plugin Features

  • Multiple payment channels available for your customers.
  • Seamless integration into the Easy Digital Downloads checkout page.
  • Add Nigerian Naira, South Africa Rand, Ghanaian Cedi and Kenyan Shilling currency symbol to select it go to the Easy Digital Downloads Settings from the left hand menu, then click General from the top tab. From the Currency sub tab select the currency you want to use, then click on Save Changes for your changes to be effected.

Suggestions / Feature Request

If you have suggestions or a new feature request, feel free to get in touch with me via the contact form on my website here

You can also follow me on Twitter! @tubiz

Contribute

To contribute to this plugin feel free to fork it on GitHub Flutterwave Easy Digital Downloads Payment Gateway
sections.installation:
Automatic Installation

  • Login to your WordPress Admin area
  • Go to “Plugins > Add New” from the left hand menu
  • In the search box type Flutterwave Easy Digital Downloads payment gateway
  • From the search result you will see Flutterwave Easy Digital Downloads payment gateway click on Install Now to install the plugin
  • A popup window will ask you to confirm your wish to install the Plugin.
  • After installation, activate the plugin.
  • Open the settings page for Easy Digital Downloads and click the “Payment Gateways” tab.
  • Click on the Flutterwave subtab from the available Checkout Options
  • Configure your Flutterwave Payment Gateway settings. See below for details.

Manual Installation

  1. Download the plugin zip file
  2. Login to your WordPress Admin. Click on “Plugins > Add New” from the left hand menu.
  3. Click on the “Upload” option, then click “Choose File” to select the zip file from your computer. Once selected, press “OK” and press the “Install Now” button.
  4. Activate the plugin.
  5. Open the settings page for Easy Digital Downloads and click the “Payment Gateways” tab.
  6. Click on the Flutterwave subtab from the available Checkout Options
  7. Configure your Flutterwave Payment Gateway settings. See below for details.

Configure the plugin

To configure the plugin, go to Downloads > Settings from the left hand menu, then click on the Payment Gateways tab. You will see Flutterwave as a subtab. Click on it to configure the payment gateway.

  • Enable Test Mode – Check to enable test mode. Test mode enables you to test payments before going live. If you ready to start receving real payment on your site, kindly uncheck this.
  • Test Public Key – Enter your Test Public Key here.
  • Test Secret Key – Enter your Test Secret Key here.
  • Live Public Key – Enter your Live Public Key here.
  • Live Secret Key – Enter your Live Secret Key here.
  • Modal Title – Enter the text to be displayed as the title of the payment modal.
  • Modal Description – Enter the text to be displayed as a short modal description.
  • Checkout Logo – Select an image to be shown on the Flutterwave Checkout modal window. Recommended minimum size is 128x128px. Leave blank to disable the image.
  • Click on Save Changes for the changes you made to be effected.
sections.faq:
What Do I Need To Use The Plugin

  1. You need to have Easy Digital Downloads plugin installed and activated on your WordPress site.
  2. You need to open a merchant account on Flutterwave
sections.changelog:
2.0.1, March 31, 2023

  • Update: WordPress 6.2 compatibility
  • New: Add support for version 3 Webhooks

2.0.0, October 13, 2021

  • Update: Upgrade to Flutterwave API v3
  • New: Support for translation
  • Update: WordPress 5.8 compatibility
  • Update: Easy Digital Downloads 3.0 compatibility

1.2.0, August 11, 2020

  • Update: WordPress 5.5 compatibility
  • Fix: Payment verification error

1.1.0, November 1, 2019

  • New: Add support for webhook URL
  • New: Add support for all currencies supported by Rave
  • Update: WordPress 5.3 compatibility
  • Update: Rave API endpoints

1.0.0, April 12, 2018

  • First release
